snippet: Tracy Streckenbach, president of Innovative Global Brands and a turnaround specialist, says it’s important that a company have clearly defined and measurable goals.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Innovative Global Brands president and chief operating officer Tracy Streckenbach, who discusses her career and management technique.
lead_paragraph: Tracy Streckenbach, president of Innovative Global Brands and a turnaround specialist, says it’s important that a company have clearly defined and measurable goals.

headline.print_headline: Clear Goals Matter More Than Mission
headline.seo: Corner Office: Goals Matter More Than Mission
headline.main: Clear Goals Matter More Than Mission
